memberdef.argsstring: (linint1D_data *str, real *c, int n_x, int bc_x, real x_min, real x_max)
memberdef.name: linint1D_init

briefdescription.para: Initialize linear interpolation struct for scalar 1D data.

parameterdescription.para: pointer to struct to be initialized
array where data is stored
number of data points in the x direction
boundary condition for x axis
minimum value of the x axis
maximum value of the x axis

array where data is stored

briefdescription.para: Initialize linear interpolation struct for scalar 3D data.

parameterdescription.para: pointer to struct to be initialized
array where data is stored
number of data points in the x direction
number of data points in the y direction
number of data points in the z direction
boundary condition for x axis
boundary condition for y axis
boundary condition for z axis
minimum value of the x axis
maximum value of the x axis

maximum value of the y axis

briefdescription.para: Evaluate interpolated value of 1D scalar field.

detaileddescription.para: This function evaluates the interpolated value of a 1D scalar field using linear interpolation.

parameterdescription.para: variable in which to place the evaluated value
data struct for data interpolation
x-coordinate

simplesect.para: zero on success and one if x point is outside the grid.

inbodydescription.para: < Normalized x coordinate in current cell

briefdescription.para: Evaluate interpolated value of 2D scalar field.

detaileddescription.para: This function evaluates the interpolated value of a 2D scalar field using bilinear interpolation.

parameterdescription.para: variable in which to place the evaluated value
data struct for data interpolation
x-coordinate
y-coordinate

simplesect.para: zero on success and one if (x,y) point is outside the grid.

memberdef.argsstring: (real *f, linint3D_data *str, real x, real y, real z)
memberdef.name: linint3D_eval_f

briefdescription.para: Evaluate interpolated value of 3D scalar field.

detaileddescription.para: This function evaluates the interpolated value of a 3D scalar field using trilinear interpolation.

parameterdescription.para: variable in which to place the evaluated value
data struct for data interpolation
x-coordinate
y-coordinate
z-coordinate

detaileddescription.para: Linear interpolation interpolates data given on a uniform grid. Each axis may have either natural or periodic boundary condition.
The interpolant does not need any initialization on the host. After offloading is done, call linintXD_init() which assigns the values and a pointer to the data to a linint struct.
